name: Curve EURT Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene EURT, una moneda estable en euros centralizada emitida por Tether, y euros sintéticos (sEUR) acuñados en la plataforma Synthetix.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, Tether tarafından çıkarılan merkezi bir euro stabilcoin olan EURT ve Synthetix platformunda basılan sentetik euro (sEUR) içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains EURT, a centralized euro stablecoin issued by Tether, and synthetic euro (sEUR) minted on the Synthetix platform.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含由 Tether 发行的中心化欧元稳定币 EURT 和由 Synthetix 发行的合成欧元 sEUR。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में EURT, Tether द्वारा जारी एक केंद्रीकृत यूरो स्थिर मुद्रा, और सिंथेटिक यूरो (sEUR) Synthetix प्लेटफॉर्म पर ढाला गया है।
